T02TD1690E:38b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1690E:38b-5: nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba ltar dmar lha mchog rnams kyi mgo yi gtsug gi nor bu'i dpal //
T02TD1690E:38b-6: phun sum tshogs pas dmar ba smug rtsi gsal po dngar bkod shin tu yun rings ma lon 'dra'i //
T02TD1690E:38b-7: 'phags ma khyod zhabs dag la thal sbyar cod pan gyis mnan yan lag mchog btud bdag gis ni //
T02TD1690E:38b-8: gus pas sgrol ma phongs skyabs bstod pa gser gyi me tog phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par bgyi //
T02TD1690E:38b-9: skad ngan du ba'i bzhin ldan rgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me la lus dag rnam ltung ba //
T02TD1690E:38b-10: ci dang ci bya zhes rmongs lan gcig min pa'i rtsom pa byas kyang 'bras dang bral bas skyo //
T02TD1690E:38b-11: mkha' la nyi zla'i dpal ni gzhan las mang du thos nas blta bar re ba bcas gyur pa'i //
T02TD1690E:38b-12: mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gro ba lta bu bdag ni sdig 'joms khyed la gus bas rten par bgyid //
T02TD1690E:38b-13: khyed kyi thugs rje sems can rnams ni kun la bye brag med par 'jug pa ma lags sam //
T02TD1690E:38b-14: de dag gzung bas bdag 'dra yang ni de dag nang du gzung bar 'gyur la gdon mi za //
T02TD1690E:38b-15: mtha' dag 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i mun par tsha zer can gzugs nus pa la yang do zla med //
T02TD1690E:38b-16: de lta mod kyi kye ma bdag smad nyes byas ngan pas brjid cing sdug bsngal ldan pa nyid //
T02TD1690E:38b-17: skal ba zhan pa bdag smad smad pa zhig ste nyin byed 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa sel //
T02TD1690E:39a-0: gangs can las byung 'jug ngogs chus dkrigs pa yi dum bu @39a * //
T02TD1690E:39a-1: 'khyags shing bsil ba dag tu bsgom //
T02TD1690E:39a-2: rin chen gling gi lam srang dang ni nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa dag gi nang du dbul //
T02TD1690E:39a-3: 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma khyod mgon du byas kyang mgon ma mchis so bcom ldan ma //
T02TD1690E:39a-4: nu ma'i rgyu las lan mang dag tu rnam par du ba'i bu lam yang skyo bar 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:39a-5: nyi ma so sor dam pa ma yin don gnyer rnams la rab bskul pha yang khro ba 'dzin //
T02TD1690E:39a-6: 'jig rten gyi ni re 'dod 'bras bus yangs ldan dpag bsam shing chen 'khri shing mchog ni khyod //
T02TD1690E:39a-7: mngon par don gnyer don rnams kun la stsol gyi nam yang rnam gyur de dag ci yang med //
T02TD1690E:39a-8: gang la nyon mongs tshogs kyi me 'bar lus can de dang de yis sgrol ma nga nyid cis //
T02TD1690E:39a-9: bdag nyid zhal bzhes dam bcas sdug bsngal 'og tu bying ba bdag la 'bras bu ldan par mdzod //
T02TD1690E:39a-10: srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal shugs ni rtsub cing zil gnon 'di dag ji snyed 'phel gyur pa //
T02TD1690E:39a-11: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam blo mnga' rnams kyi brtse ba'ang de snyed nyid //
T02TD1690E:39a-12: de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gi zol gyis cho nge'i sgra dag gsang mthon sgrogs shing lag bsgreng la /
T02TD1690E:39a-13: gzhan dag gis kyang btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na yum gcig khyod kyis lta yang ci //
T02TD1690E:39a-14: gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor par 'dod pa khyed las thob pa rnams mthong bzhin //
T02TD1690E:39a-15: mi dge las byung nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags bzod blag med pas shin tu yang yang sreg / gal te kho bo sdig can lags na khyod la gus pa chen po 'di ni ci phyir 'phel //
T02TD1690E:39a-16: khyod nyid gcig pu'i mtshan gyis kyang ni thos dang dran pas 'phral la sdig pa sel bar byed //
T02TD1690E:39a-17: de lta na yang bdag gi bya ba'i khur dag dong ba ji ltar lags zhes bden gsungs pa //
T02TD1690E:39a-18: nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur yang sman pa'i snying rje rgya chen phan pa khon par bgyid dam ci //
T02TD1690E:39a-19: sgyu mang ser sna nga rgyal phrag dog rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis dus mnyam rim par yang //
T02TD1690E:39a-20: du ma dag gi thun mong char gyur tshogs khang rnga mo bzhin du bskor bar gyur pas na //
T02TD1690E:39b-0: khyed kyi zhabs pad mchod pa skad @39b cig tsam yang ma rnyed gang de'i don du khyad par las //
T02TD1690E:39b-1: phongs pas yi ge dman par tshig 'di bkod do bdag gi 'dod pa don med ma gyur cig / dus mtha'i rlung rab 'khrugs pas dkrugs pa'i chu ni g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rlung 'khor ral pa can //
T02TD1690E:39b-2: rab 'khrugs kun du bskyod cing rba rlabs ngos brdabs sgra grag gad rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa las //
T02TD1690E:39b-3: gru chag chu ru snying rje du ba'i tshe de dang ldan g-yo ba med cing zhan gyur pa //
T02TD1690E:39b-4: lha mo khyod la bstod pa rnams kyis 'phral la chu gter 'gram du rang dga' thar bar 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:39b-5: du ba 'tshubs pa sprin 'dra khong nas rab byung me stag mkha' khyim nang du rnam par rgyu //
T02TD1690E:39b-6: me dpung me lce 'phro zhing rab 'bar drag po'i khang par mal stan dag la rab 'khod pa //
T02TD1690E:39b-7: thal sbyar cod pan ldan pas khyed la btud byas ldab ldib dag tu gsol ba 'debs pa rnams //
T02TD1690E:39b-8: glog rab 'gyur ba'i rtse dga' rab 'bar chu 'dzin shugs kyis skad cig nyid la sgrib par byed //
T02TD1690E:39b-9: myos pa'i chu rgyas 'gram pa gnyis ka'i ngos la babs pas bung ba dag gi phreng ba can //
T02TD1690E:39b-10: h'um zhes bya bas bos par gyur ba'i gling chen zla bos zhe sdang me spar gnyis 'thung gi //
T02TD1690E:39b-11: so rtse rab tu mtho ba'i khyogs la blangs pa'i lus can dag gis khyod rjes dran pa na //
T02TD1690E:39b-12: rtse mo che ldan mgo rtse'i rdzong la 'dug cing rab tu dga' bas 'chi bdag phyir zlog byed //
T02TD1690E:39b-13: mdung rings drag pos bsnun bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing dag gi 'khri shing dga' ston can //
T02TD1690E:39b-14: nags tshal stong par chom rkun lag rtses ral gri g-yo zhing brdeg par gzas pas dregs rgyas pa //
T02TD1690E:39b-15: khro gnyer dang bcas smin 'khyog zur mig gis bltas mig can rnams ni khyed mtshan dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD1690E:39b-16: gsal bar 'dri ba'i gnas la bsam pa'i smyu gu skyo med rnams kyis bran du bkol bar byed //
T02TD1690E:39b-17: rab rno sder mo'i rtse ni rdo rje lta bur bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i klad 'gems nas //
T02TD1690E:39b-18: khrag mang rab tu zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung yangs phrag pa khebs //
T02TD1690E:39b-19: khros te rgyang nas steng du 'phyong 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dgas dgra //
T02TD1690E:40a-0: khyod la 'os pa'i bstod pa don ldan tshig dag @40a * //
T02TD1690E:40a-1: bkod pas skrag ste log nas 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:40a-2: gdengs can rnam 'gyur du ba'i khyim dang mun pa'i dbyibs can gsal bar phud sgra dag gi tshogs //
T02TD1690E:40a-3: byed pa dang ldan kha gdangs ro 'dzin thag pa gshin rje'i zhags 'dra che zhing g-yo ba dag / sdig pa las byung slar yang khyod skyong bdag nyid khyod kyi yon tan bgrang bar lhur len pas //
T02TD1690E:40a-4: autpala phreng ba'i rgyan gyis 'byor pa bung ba myos pa'i phreng bas dkris ltar 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:40a-5: rje bo'i smin ma bskyod pas 'jigs pa dag gis rgod cing 'phyag pas drangs la co dog gzings //
T02TD1690E:40a-6: g-yo zhing sgra sgrogs bran khol rnams kyis rtsub mor smra byed zhags pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings //
T02TD1690E:40a-7: bkres skom dag gis kha dang mgrin skams gang zhig 'phag ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba //
T02TD1690E:40a-8: de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis spangs kyang mtha' med rgud pa de dag 'phral du gtor bar 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:40a-9: sgyu ma 'phrul pa'i lam gyi rim pas rnam par 'gyur ba du ma dag gis chas byas shing //
T02TD1690E:40a-10: log pa'i gzugs tsam rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mi bzad ldan //
T02TD1690E:40a-11: mi ro las bton rgyu ma'i thag pa'i tshogs kyi phreng bas rnam par spras pa'i srin po rnams //
T02TD1690E:40a-12: khyed rgyud las btus gsang sngags dran pas sdig pa phrogs pa'i srung ma gzhom med byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:40a-13: glang chen sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can myos byed chu bo'i rgyun dang ldan pas mun gtibs shing //
T02TD1690E:40a-14: mtshon cha 'od zer rnams ni glog rab 'gyu ltar rab gsal mda' yi char 'bab g-yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe //
T02TD1690E:40a-15: rnam par snang ba'i dgra bo dpung pa'i stobs ni rab mchog ldan pa rnams kyis bkag gyur pa //
T02TD1690E:40a-16: khyod kyi dgra bo gsod pa'i dpa' bo gcig gis 'phral du dgra yis gzhi phye mar rlog / sdig spyod dag gi rjes 'brang phol mig chabs can dag las rnag khrag rul pa rab 'dzag cing //
T02TD1690E:40a-17: sha lpags myags pa la chags rtsa yi sgo yi bu gar 'gul ba'i srog chags kyis zos lus zad rnams //
T02TD1690E:40a-18: khyod zhabs nye bar brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu gus shing chags pa yis //
T02TD1690E:40b-0: sa le sbram dang mtshungs @40b pa'i lus dang padma dkar po ltar yangs mig dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:40b-1: gang gi rna ba'i snod na bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba'i man ngag slong mo mi gnas shing //
T02TD1690E:40b-2: thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams dag tu lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang //
T02TD1690E:40b-3: de yang khyed la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams thams cad mdzes byed 'byor par bcas pa yis //
T02TD1690E:40b-4: ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1690E:40b-5: sa gzhi mal stan rdul gyis lus bsgos skyed ngos ras ral yan lag dag ni rnam par mngon //
T02TD1690E:40b-6: shig gi tshe dag rab gtser gzhan gyi grong khyer mdun du g-yo mor zas ni don gnyer ba //
T02TD1690E:40b-7: khyod mnyes bgyid la brtson pas na chung mchog gis bzung ba'i rnga yab 'dzum gyis rab mdzes shing //
T02TD1690E:40b-8: myos pas long ba'i gnyis 'thung sos gtams gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa'i sa gzhi 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:40b-9: g-yog dang las mtha' bzo dang dbang po gso ba'i thabs kyi rnam grangs dag gis rab skyo zhing //
T02TD1690E:40b-10: skye ba snga mar rab bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa'i dge 'bras nor ni thob par ma gyur ba'i //
T02TD1690E:40b-11: nor med rnams kyis skye bo bkres pa'i yum gyur phongs las 'da' bar mdzad pa khyod la don //
T02TD1690E:40b-12: don du gnyer na slar yang gser gyi tshogs kyi gter dag sa las 'thon pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:40b-13: 'tsho ba chad las ngo tshar gyur cing gos zad chung ma dag gis rab tu spyo bar byed //
T02TD1690E:40b-14: bdag nyid gso phyir rang gi skye bo bu dang grogs po gnyen gyis ring du spangs pa yis //
T02TD1690E:40b-15: khyed la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras //
T02TD1690E:40b-16: gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byed //
T02TD1690E:40b-17: 'khor lo phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sbyor bud med mtshan brgyan 'od zer g-yo zhing che ba dang //
T02TD1690E:40b-18: glang chen gtso bo mche ba drug ldan rta mchog spu kha sngo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher //
T02TD1690E:40b-19: nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar gsal dri med yon tan mdzod 'dzin mdzod khengs dang //
T02TD1690E:41a-0: dmag dpon dpal sde ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas phra @41a * //
T02TD1690E:41a-2: tsandan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo la mdzes mas dus btab rtse dga' la chags pas //
T02TD1690E:41a-3: sdu gu ma yi bde ba'i nyer spyad mgron du bya ba mngon par gsang ba rab bsgrubs shing //
T02TD1690E:41a-4: ral gri 'od zer gyis sdo spom mtho dpung pa gtun shing dang 'dva dpung rgyan rol pa can //
T02TD1690E:41a-5: khyod kyi rigs drug rig 'dzin dbang po ma la ya yi me tog tshal du rang dgar 'gro //
T02TD1690E:41a-6: nu ma'i thon 'khor do shal gyis brgyan mig dkyus ring po rna ba'i autpala la 'gran cing //
T02TD1690E:41a-7: lha mo yid 'ong manda ra ba dang ldan ze 'bru gsar pa'i dris myos bung ba can //
T02TD1690E:41a-8: dril chung sgra yis rjes 'brel rab tu gsal bar rkang gdub yid 'ong sgra snyan sgrogs par byed //
T02TD1690E:41a-9: 'dod pas myos dga' gzhon nu ma rnams gus dang bcas par khyed mgon ldan pa don du gnyer //
T02TD1690E:41a-10: rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad ldan ze'u 'bru rdo rje phreng ba can //
T02TD1690E:41a-11: yongs 'du'i ljon pa las 'phro dri bzang dang ldan me tog rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te //
T02TD1690E:41a-12: pi wang gling bu sgrogs mkhas lha yi grong gi dga' ba rnams kyis snyan par rab bsgrags pa'i //
T02TD1690E:41a-13: dga' ba'i skyed tshal bgrod pa khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun ring nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:41a-14: nang gi byed pa khyod la gtad pa'i bsod nams mthu ni rab 'bar yongs su smin pa yis //
T02TD1690E:41a-15: ga pur ae la li shi shun pa aa ka ru dang na la da phye'i dri ldan chu //
T02TD1690E:41a-16: 'dod pa'i dregs pas rab 'bur bud med nu ma'i skyibs su rba rlabs 'khyil gnas dal 'bab pa //
T02TD1690E:41a-17: sman min chu yi zer ma dang ldan chu rtsed mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig rtse bar 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:41a-18: tshig mtha'i gtso bo dul ba'i khur gyis cod pan dud pa rnams kyis bka' la phyag byas shing //
T02TD1690E:41a-19: mtho ris steng du lha yis glang chen khrol khrol rgyan gyis spud pa'i lus can la zhon te //
T02TD1690E:41a-20: spu lang dang rgyas lus can bde sogs lag pa'i thag pa khyogs kyis rgyun du bskyil gyur pa //
T02TD1690E:41a-21: khyed kyi spyan ras phog pas dag byas lag pa rdo rje ldan pa'i lhas skyong byed //
T02TD1690E:41a-22: gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis mnan bzhugs bde bar gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal 'byor bla re can //
T02TD1690E:41b-0: nyi ma @41b 'char ka bye ba lta bur rab gsal 'od zer rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing //
T02TD1690E:41b-1: brtan par g-yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis mnan khur gyis tshangs dbang drag po khyab 'jug rnams 'dud pa'i //
T02TD1690E:41b-2: khyed sku bsgoms pa skye ba la brten rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa gcod pa'i slad du 'gyur //
T02TD1690E:41b-3: khro ba dang bcas mtshon cha'i 'od zer rab 'bar phyag dbyig cha yis nam mkha'i khongs dag khyab //
T02TD1690E:41b-4: gdu bu'i gdengs can dag gi gdengs ka mi bzad mi 'phrogs spyod ldan sdang rnams skrag mdzad bzhad //
T02TD1690E:41b-5: cang te'u drag po tshabs cher brdungs pa'i tshe na ro langs rnams ni drag por pheg rdob cing //
T02TD1690E:41b-6: bag med rgyas pas ca co chen po sgrogs par byed pa'i drag mor la la dag gis mthong //
T02TD1690E:41b-7: la las ba spu re re las byung nam mkha'i khyon gnas sa dang sa 'og dag na gnas //
T02TD1690E:41b-8: mtho ris la gnas tshangs dbang drag po la sogs mi dang lha dang grub pa'i dri za klu //
T02TD1690E:41b-9: phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas dag gi sku //
T02TD1690E:41b-10: ngo mtshar 'jig rten gsum gyi phyag 'os brtan g-yo bkod pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor ro //
T02TD1690E:41b-11: la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon dang nyi zhon dmar ba nyid ltar shin tu dmar ba dang //
T02TD1690E:41b-12: de bzhin gzhan gyis snum zhing 'od ldan mthon mthing rdo bcag btags pa'i phye ma ltar sdo dang //
T02TD1690E:41b-13: la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i 'od ltar ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od lta bu ste //
T02TD1690E:41b-14: khyed sku sna tshogs ngo bo nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad shel bzhin no //
T02TD1690E:41b-15: kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mas shes bya mtha' dag gsal byas de nyid dag gi dbang gcig pu //
T02TD1690E:41b-16: kun rig nyid dam de yi sras kyis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni mngon sum mkhyen //
T02TD1690E:41b-17: bdag 'dra gtor ma spyod pa sgrogs pa lta bur kha gdangs ku co che bar 'don pa gang //
T02TD1690E:41b-18: de ni mi bzad sdug bsngal gdung bas nad bskyed sems kyi rgud pa bzhad gad dag gi rgyu //
T02TD1690E:41b-19: bdag gis zhu ba gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyed kyis khyad par du mkhyen te //
T02TD1690E:42a-0: 'on kyang lhag par de brjod ngal ba'i sgrub byed mi @42a * //
T02TD1690E:42a-1: mkhas bdag rang sems tshim pa yi rgyu //
T02TD1690E:42a-2: don shes zin yang gnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du sdug bsngal ldan pas tshig gis sdug bsngal ni //
T02TD1690E:42a-3: dug bzhin skyugs par gyur na snying yang seng zhes byed cing rnam par gnas par tshor ba bzhin //
T02TD1690E:42a-4: dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal po bsil ba'i gzigs par stsal du gsol //
T02TD1690E:42a-5: ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod cig thugs rjes sdig ldan nang gi mun pa sel //
T02TD1690E:42a-6: gang phyir 'gro ba dag na khyod bstod chu yis yid ni dag par byas pa kho bo la //
T02TD1690E:42a-7: skye dgu rnams kyi dge legs gnas ni don yod khyod kyi yon tan bstod tsam gcig pu mthong //
T02TD1690E:42a-8: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag gis 'di tsam zhes par ma nges pa'i //
T02TD1690E:42a-9: bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ro myang 'gro ba'i bar du spyad bya ba //
T02TD1690E:42a-10: gang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi //
T02TD1690E:42a-11: bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i sa gzhi bde ba can zhes bya de myur du bgrod bar shog / phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa pandi ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ba shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
